pull.title: [Qt] Add column Watch-only to transactions list
pull.body:
- Changes the condition for showing watch-only to if there has been watch-only imported or not, instead of looking at the balance. The labels should be shown, even with a balance of zero, if you run importaddress.
- Adds new filterable dynamic column Watch-only

![watchonly_column4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/3869705/126a03c2-20a3-11e4-9685-2e5a0e05250f.png)

![watchonly_column1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/3869701/099cd6fc-20a3-11e4-8c5e-0e673c7fba3f.png)

![watchonly_column2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/3869702/0e8174ac-20a3-11e4-9ae7-b35947d42ebe.png)

events.body: I don't really like adding a separate column for this with just yes/no. I'd prefer a more compact way to signal these, like changing the color, adding an icon, .... (many other things possible)
Or, a very narrow column with just a checkbox or such would be acceptable to me too. But this one is much too wide.

events.message: Add boolean HaveWatchonly and signal NotifyWatchonlyChanged

events.body:
I think it would be nice, to be able to sort and filter by watchonly. Updated now with an eye-icon and narrow column.

![watchonly_column5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/3881033/21292ea0-218a-11e4-8db5-6647d9754e2f.png)

![watchonly_column6](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/3881035/257ab4ce-218a-11e4-8587-23fbf3afaa39.png)

Are there changes to the tooltip also? Does it read watch-only in it or ist there also that eye?
Tooltip says nothing new currently, as I removed the (w) completely. I may add this back in, and say watch-only in the tooltip.
